Competitions.name: DSA Craft
Competitions.description:
This competition for college and 
university students emphasizes..
Competitions.detailedDescription: This competition for college and university students emphasizes the vital role of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Teams of four navigate testing their DSA, Logical Reasoning, and Object-Oriented Programming skills. The competition focuses on project development in various domains. Recognizing top projects promotes the significance of DSA in problem-solving and creativity, offering participants a platform to showcase and enhance their skills in an ethical competitive environment.

Competitions.name: Rope Climbing Robot
Competitions.description: The competition is fierce, with a variety of challenging...
Competitions.detailedDescription: The competition is fierce, with a variety of challenging conditions including robot weight restrictions, team composition, and other technical constraints. The clock is ticking, and every second counts! The winner will be based on a robot crossing the finish mark with minimum time.

Competitions.name: AI' Artist
Competitions.description: Create AI-generated art, focusing on how to prompt...
Competitions.detailedDescription: Create AI-generated art, focusing on how to prompt the AI to get the best possible desired outcome. A chance to work on the most demanded AI platform DALL-E. Create a story based on the images.

Competitions.name: ProtoSprint
Competitions.description: Create functional objects or prototypes on SOLIDWorks within a specified...
Competitions.detailedDescription: Create functional objects or prototypes on SOLIDWorks within a specified time frame based on a given number of constraints and present a PPT on its concept design & working.

Competitions.name: Ideation
Competitions.description: "Ideation springs from its root word, ""idea"" and involves...
Competitions.detailedDescription: "Ideation springs from its root word, ""idea"" and involves the mental process of brainstorming concepts and theories. A fundamental problem statement will be provided to the team, which is to be implemented using the given material in the given stipulated amount of time."

Competitions.name: CTF -CODExMATH
Competitions.description: Capture The Flag (CTF) is a type of competition that challenges...
Competitions.detailedDescription: Capture The Flag (CTF) is a type of competition that challenges participants to solve a variety of security-related tasks to uncover "flags" hidden within vulnerable systems or applications. These flags are typically short strings of text that serve as proof that the participant has successfully exploited a vulnerability or solved a particular challenge.

Competitions.name: Tech Debate Competition -IEEExTDSC
Competitions.description: The Tech Debate Competition consists of multiple rounds where...
Competitions.detailedDescription: The Tech Debate Competition consists of multiple rounds where teams will engage in debates on various technology-related topics. The competition aims to foster critical thinking, persuasive communication, and teamwork among participants.

Competitions.name: Engineer's Canvas
Competitions.description: "Engineer's Canvas" is an inclusive competition for innovative...
Competitions.detailedDescription: "Engineer's Canvas" is an inclusive competition for innovative projects and ongoing research, emphasizing Originality, technology aspects, and Purpose. Participants craft visually striking posters highlighting their project's design methodology, approach, and technology used. Presentations focus on showcasing findings and research contributions, providing a platform for participants to demonstrate their unique perspectives in engineering and research.

Competitions.description: Ready to code your way through real-world challenges? Join our Software Hackathon for...
Competitions.detailedDescription: Ready to code your way through real-world challenges? Join our Software Hackathon for 24 hours of non-stop problem-solving! Get hands-on with industry problem statements and engineer innovative solutions. Don't miss out â€“ register now!

Competitions.name: Datathon
Competitions.description: Datathon, a 10-hour Data Science Hackathon, is a dynamic platform for teams to...
Competitions.detailedDescription: Datathon, a 10-hour Data Science Hackathon, is a dynamic platform for teams to showcase their prowess in AI, ML, and Data Science through real-time projects. Emphasizing the core of data science, participants, in teams of three to four, dive into industry-oriented challenges.

Competitions.name: Quantum computing workshop
Competitions.description: A 3-hour Quantum Computing Workshop. Through hands-on activities, participants...
Competitions.detailedDescription: A 3-hour Quantum Computing Workshop. Through hands-on activities, participants will explore the fundamentals of quantum mechanics and delve into the principles of quantum computing. Engage with qubits, quantum gates, and algorithms, gaining practical insights into this cutting-edge technology's potential applications.

Competitions.detailedDescription: Followed by fun activities around the same topic. Individual participation.

Competitions.detailedDescription: A fusion of monetary dealings and challenging tasks followed by building a hands-on assembly in limited time.

Competitions.name: TrailBlazers
Competitions.description: Event in which one partner navigates through...
Competitions.detailedDescription: Event in which one partner navigates through hurdles with the help of another partner without using the conventional directional words, instead using code words for directions.

Competitions.name: Battle Royale Brawl (E-Sports Event) : CODM
Competitions.description: Gear up for an electrifying inter-college E-sports...
Competitions.detailedDescription: Gear up for an electrifying inter-college E-sports extravaganza! Dive into the adrenaline-fueled action of our E-sports event featuring intense battles in Fall Guys and tactical warfare in Call of Duty Mobile(CODM). Race through virtual playgrounds, hurdle obstacles, and engage in tactical warfare for a chance to claim glory!

Competitions.name: TradeTrek
Competitions.description: TradeTrek is an import-export game especially curated for ...
Competitions.detailedDescription: TradeTrek is an import-export game especially curated for international relations enthusiasts, where teams represent a country and trade resources to move towards a goal whilst strategizing about their countryâ€™s balance of payments.

Competitions.name: Amoung Us AR/VR
Competitions.description: An offline social deduction game inspired by 'Among Us', where players...
Competitions.detailedDescription: An offline social deduction game inspired by 'Among Us', where players complete AR tasks while imposters try to sabotage and eliminate crewmates. The Virtual Reality Showcase aims to provide participants with an immersive experience in virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR). Attendees can explore various virtual environments and interactive experiences using Oculus Quest 2 headsets while engaging in AR-based activities while waiting in queue.
